name: Mayday (itch) (SpaceMarco)
description:
It's a game about an astronaut who got lost in space and must survive the harsh and deadly environment until they are rescued by the ship. 

This is a submission for GGJ2021

Objective:

You must survive until the yellow bar on the top is completed.
you mustn't let your health bar reach zero, you can regenerate your health by filling the oxygen bar.


Controls:

WASD - to move.

Credits:

  • Music by Nex#7920 (from Discord)
